programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: A page from the diary of John Wilkes Booth implicates Ben Gates' (Nicolas Cage) great-great grandfather as a major conspirator in the assassination of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: A man and his ex-wife race to Bali, Indonesia, to stop their daughter from marrying a seaweed farmer. As they desperately try to sabotage the wedding, the bickering duo soon find themselves rekindling old feelings that once made them happy together.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the investigation into a missing teen leads the detectives to a severed leg, they are drawn into the world of self-mutilation and ritual amputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A promising singer is beaten by her boyfriend, a famous hip-hop star, but she refuses to help ADA Barba build his case; the defendant and his attorney turn the case into a media circus.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Investigation into the suspected rape of a woman Benson helped earlier leads to a cybermogul; the team bids farewell to Sgt. Munch.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a suspect is gravely injured and the case becomes a public spectacle, Amaro's badge is on the line; Cragen surprises everyone with an announcement.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The already frantic search for a missing diabetic boy becomes more urgent when he is spotted with a couple known for child endangerment and pornography.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A clue no bigger than a thumbtack leads investigators to a trio of killers.

The first responders race to help a homeless man crushed in a garbage truck, a mother and son in a crashed elevator, and extreme hoarders trapped in their house; Athena starts dating; the situation with Abby's mother tests her relationship with Buck.

The first responders take calls involving an unusual domestic disturbance, a "death" at a psychic's place, and a motorcycle crash; Bobby dips his toes into the dating pool; Abby walks down memory lane, and Buck is confronted by his past actions.

On one of the hottest days of the year, the first responders must deal with harrowing incidents all around the city; Buck gets a surprise visit from his sister; Athena questions her relationship with Bobby; Buck worries about a handsome new hire.

A massive earthquake rocks Los Angeles; the first responders rush to rescue victims from a crumbling high-rise hotel; Athena must deal with wreckage from a collapsed freeway overpass; Maddie faces her first crisis as a 911 dispatcher.

The first responders continue to deal with the fallout of a massive earthquake; Athena tries to keep the peace as Bobby and team continue to rescue victims from a collapsing high-rise hotel; Maddie must help a pregnant couple deliver their baby.

The first responders race to rescue victims trapped in various tight spots; Athena contemplates accepting a promotion that will take her out of the field; Chimney finally deals with the aftermath of his near fatal car crash.

Maddie goes on a ride-along with Athena; Hen must figure out how to save her family from permanently falling apart; the first responders deal with emergencies both at a military funeral and a movie theater.

The first responders unwittingly become the subject of an eager reporter's first on-air assignment; Athena prepares for May's homecoming dance; the team responds to emergencies at an eating contest, a bodybuilding competition and a toddler pageant.

programme.desc: The best moments from the weekend in Premier League action.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In a wealthy area of Philadelphia, police are called to the scene of what seems like a regular accidental drowning; the investigation begins to focus on one person who has many reasons to want the victim dead.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl at Detective Stabler's daughter's school accuses another student of rape; ADA Paxton (Christine Lahti) returns to prosecute.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Stabler and Tutuola search for a victim and her attacker after video of a sexual assault is featured on a college campus Intranet feed.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After shedding hundreds of pounds, a popular kindergarten teacher goes missing; investigators find a link between her weight loss and her disappearance.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When Bonnie Craig was found dead, police collected DNA, but it didn't match anyone in the system; 12 years later there is a hit, but the man is thousands of miles away and, as it turns out, prosecutors need more than DNA to convict a killer.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: As a murder victim's sisters dedicate themselves to finding the killer, an unexpected source turns the case upside down.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey and Naomi fight to escape a raging fire in Casey's apartment; Brett and the team struggle to create an engaging community fire safety presentation; Severide and Kidd's relationship reaches a crossroads.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey further investigates a motorcycle accident at the request of the victim's son; Kidd, Foster and Brett bond while helping Kidd fix a mistake; Mouch and Otis have a falling out after Otis' teasing hits a sore spot.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Cruz leads the charge in getting the firehouse to gear up for the Polar Plunge; Herrmann has a hard time bouncing back after dealing with a tough call; Foster's personal relationships begin to interfere with her job.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Brett, Foster and Kidd take a road trip to Indiana and encounter an accident involving a boys' hockey team that leaves them scrambling and relying on their instincts to save the injured; the rest of Firehouse 51 competes in the annual chili cook-off.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A spate of robberies comes to light after a firehouse lockbox key goes missing; Sgt. Hank Voight suspects a firefighter may be involved, and with Boden's support, he recruits Cruz to go under cover to help sniff out any suspicious activity.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey struggles after experiencing a narrow miss on a call; Otis wins a unique sporting opportunity in a raffle; Grissom turns to Severide for assistance when the mayor's office sends a task force to Firehouse 51.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Tensions run high between Casey and Herrmann after the firehouse responds to an apartment complex fire; after discovering something extremely suspicious during the call, Kidd and Severide do some investigating and get CPD on the case.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Elks run with the Redblacks in the nation's capital. Edmonton seeks a third straight win after beating Montreal and Toronto. Justin Rankin led the Elks in rushing and receiving and scored two TDs when Edmonton held off Ottawa 39-33 on July 6.
